story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_01: It looks like this is as far as we can go...
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_03:
You’ve been causing quite the ruckus, but that
ends here.
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_06: If you shun my ideals, you’re useless to me.
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_10: What is this ideal world of yours, anyway?
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_11:
After all that hurt you caused the people and
Pokémon of Sinnoh, that’s your plan?
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_12:
You’re just gonna use everyone, then throw them
away when they’re not useful to you anymore?
Is that the ideal world you want?
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_13: That is what it means to think efficiently.
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_14:
An incomplete spirit will only get in the way of
making the right choices.
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_15:
If we all lose our human spirit, I can’t become
friends with you, Cyrus!
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_16:
Human spirit is the cause of our suffering,
worries, and mistakes!
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_17: I must fix this twisted world!
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_18:
This world must be rid of incomplete spirit—and
become one where feelings such as joy, anger,
and despair no longer exist!
story_teamgalactic_01_12000/2401_1201_19: All human spirit must be erased! No exceptions!
